articles.author: Nicholas Vinocur
articles.title: If you think Trump’s migration policies are extreme, look at the EU’s - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: As anti-immigrant sentiment surges in Europe, under-threat leaders are embracing formerly taboo approaches to their borders.
articles.content:
A new wind is blowing in Europe, said the Dutch anti-Islam, anti-immigration populist Freedom Party leader Geert Wilders in Brussels on Thursday after a meeting of far-right leaders.
Migration has b… [+1264 chars]
